entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Varennes
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:56 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. Low minus 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
